unnormalised: Arrey bhai, that new flyover they're building near my house is massive! I heard it's gonna be like, 2.5 km long. The pillars are seriously thick, maybe 1.5 m in diameter? And the engineer was saying they used like, 50000 kg of steel for just one section! Crazy, right? I hope it actually reduces the traffic jam; right now, it's adding an extra 30 mins to my commute, at least!
normalised: Arrey bhai, that new flyover they are building near my house is massive! I heard it is going to be like, two point five kilometer long. The pillars are seriously thick, maybe one point five meter in diameter? And the engineer was saying they used like, fifty thousand kilogram of steel for just one section! Crazy, right? I hope it actually reduces the traffic jam; right now, it is adding an extra thirty minutes to my commute, at least!
